publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-904 Kenny MacAskill: Draft Scottish Police Services Authority (Police Support Services) (Modification) Order 2007—That the Justice Committee recommends that the draft Scottish Police Services Authority (Police Support Services) (Modification) Order 2007 be approved. Supported by: Fergus Ewing*

S3M-904 Kenny MacAskill: Draft Scottish Police Services Authority (Police Support Services) (Modification) Order 2007—That the Justice Committee recommends that the draft Scottish Police Services Authority (Police Support Services) (Modification) Order 2007 be approved. Supported by: Fergus Ewing
